defendantAddress: n Fisher Tunnel7658121 South Lillie Avon DA6 7ND

offenceResults.impositionOffenceDetails:
FO - Fine
Fined £3456.00
IMP - Imprisonment
Committed to prison for 6 Years Concurrent Consecutive to offence Consecutive to offence. Reason: failure to comply with requirements of post custodial sentence supervision because of an unprovoked attack of a serious nature, because the defendant has a flagrant disregard for court orders, because the defendant has a flagrant disregard for people and their property. Bail remand days to count (Tagged Days): 45. Number of days in custody in foreign jurisdiction to count: 45. Total custodial period is life.
 
 
FVS - Surcharge
To pay a surcharge of £56789.00
LUMSI - Payment terms - Lump sum plus instalments
Payment terms - Lump sum plus instalments. Lump sum amount: £567.00. Instalment amount: £432.00 to be paid monthly from 11/11/2026.
Total custodial period is life.
vulnerability - Risk or vulnerability factors

FCOMP - Compensation
To pay compensation of £4321.00. This order relates to an offence the defendant admitted and asked the court to take into consideration on sentence
FVEBD - Vehicle Excise Back Duty
Ordered to pay vehicle excise back duty of £54678.00.
